feed.title: AO3 - Clark Kent/Bruce Wayne (Filtered)

entry.title: Displaced
entry.summary:
Author: ClarkKents_Biceps

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 96,222Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 181

Summary: - The story where a bit of time travelling mishaps happen and make life very complicated for Superbat - Chaos. Pure chaos. Downtown Gotham City had gone to hell. The place was an absolute mess — in fact, calling it a mess was an understatement. Gotham shimmered like it had gone mad: cars levitated inches too high; graffiti shifted when no one looked; even the shadows seemed to dance. Chaos grinned in every windowpane. And behind it lurked an interdimensional imp — a creature with obscene power, far too much for anyone’s good — spreading madness as a result of trying to fanboy over his favourite hero. Every spark of chaos was one of his well-meant ideas let loose. “Nightwing!” Tim barked at his comms eyes locked on Gotham — alive, wild, awake. It was wrong, The city wasn’t supposed to move like this. Oh man we are so fucked…

entry.title: tying me to you
entry.summary:
Author: Areiton

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,615Chapters: 7/24Kudos: 46

Summary: It was a gauntlet, getting here, and now that he is--now that there is nothing to do but watch the vows being said and the Families reacting, now he can second guess himself. It's done. Right or wrong, the decision is made. Peter has a husband, bound to him by magic and blood and, in a few minutes, law. He takes a deep breath and for the first time in a very long time, he considers praying.

entry.title: Hydroponic Weed
entry.summary:
Author: urlkelley

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 17,136Chapters: 5/23Kudos: 122

Summary: A few months after moving to Gotham for a better job opportunity, Clark realizes it isn't all it shaped up to be. Forced to find a second job to make ends meet, Clark is hired part time at Gotham Men’s Shelter, where he meets Bruce Wayne, homeless and deep in the throes of addiction after the death of his butler and the loss of his father’s company. Could they each be exactly what the other needs, a light in the darkness, a familiar face in a city of strangers? How fine is the line between a helping hand and one that enables?

entry.title: The Protection Agreement
entry.summary:
Author: Nacrestack

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,934Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 214

Summary: Superman has finally had enough. It has been far too long for him to not reveal his identity. When he commits to outing himself to the JL he'll have to contend with the ever cautious Batman. Little does Clark know, Batman isn't nearly as opposed as he seems and Batman might have a secret of his own to share. Too bad everything goes wrong as soon as Batman starts to open up. First it's the media frenzy, then Batman's weird behavior, then Bruce Wayne's ridiculous antics and finally a dangerous villainous plot. Clark is sure he'll never learn more about his best friend after this giant mess.

entry.title: Bullseye
entry.summary:
Author: NotCassia

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,010Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 54

Summary: "How much money did you bet? I hope I'm not losing you a fortune." Bruce teased, barely hiding his smirk behind his whiskey glass as he took a sip of his ginger ale. His glinting eyes reminding Clark of a frozen lake's surface catching light from a sunrise. Clark's snort turned into a brief chuckle.Before Bruce raised the hand holding the knife, without looking away from Clark, throwing the knife at the dart board. The angle he threw it from was awkward. He hadn't looked at the board and he was still sipping his ginger ale. It hit the bullseye, right at the centre.

entry.title: torn sleeve
entry.summary:
Author: sillybob24

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,312Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 46

Summary: “Is there anything I can do?” Clark asks, shifting his weight, eyes darting from Bruce’s arm to the back of Alfred’s head. The butler eyes the tear in his ward’s skin, one he had to be careful with because armor was embedded into flesh. It was a silent, delicate procedure, one that required anesthetic. Bruce, lost in thought, glances down at his arm. This was a… failed attempt at training Superman in hand-to-hand combat. “Perhaps,” Alfred responds in lieu of Bruce’s silence. “You could tell me what happened.” or, Clark is an anxious, guilty mess, and Bruce is… himself.

entry.title: Bonded by Blood
entry.summary:
Author: 3v3rl0ve

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 32,473Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 93

Summary: What if 'Clark Kent' as we know him, was born and raised on Krypton. What if the planet was destroyed on his 19th birthday, and this time, instead of Kal-el and Kara Zor-el being the only Kryptonians to survive, a much larger group of them do. Earth must learn to co-habitate with these new 'aliens' in their solar system. The Kryptonians must learn to control and not monopolise their extreme strength. What better way to do this then to arrange a marriage between the youngest surviving member of the Kryptonians, and the easily-controlled Gothamite billionaire play-boy.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 107,561Chapters: 21/?Kudos: 235

Summary: “Oh, you do like to flirt, don’t you?” Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entrée: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn’t help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. “Flirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‘Everything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power’. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you’ve got the whole world in your hands.” After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can’t escape.
